name: Remote File
description: The Remote File Universal Orchestrator extension remotely manages various file-based cryptographic certificate stores including PEM, DER, PKCS#12, JKS, KDB, and Oracle Wallets, supporting inventory, addition, and removal of certificates.

store_types.Name: RFJKS
store_types.ClientMachineDescription: The Client Machine field for Certificate Stores of type 'RFJKS' should be the DNS name or IP address of the remote orchestrated Linux or Windows server. Example for Windows: 'https://myserver.mydomain.com:5986'.
store_types.StorePathDescription: The Store Path field for Certificate Stores of type 'RFJKS' should include the full path and file name, including the file extension if one exists. Example for Linux: '/folder/path/storename.jks'.

store_types.Name: RFPEM
store_types.ClientMachineDescription: The Client Machine field for Certificate Stores of type 'RFPEM' should be the DNS name or IP address of the remote orchestrated server. Example for Windows: 'https://myserver.mydomain.com:5986'.
store_types.StorePathDescription: The Store Path field for Certificate Stores of type 'RFPEM' should include the full path and file name, along with the file extension if applicable. Example for Linux: '/folder/path/certificate.pem'.

store_types.Name: RFPkcs12
store_types.ClientMachineDescription: The Client Machine field for Certificate Stores of type 'RFPkcs12' should be the DNS name or IP address of the remote orchestrated Linux or Windows server. Example for Windows: 'https://myserver.mydomain.com:5986'.
store_types.StorePathDescription: The Store Path field for Certificate Stores of type 'RFPkcs12' should include the full path and file name, along with the file extension if applicable. Example for Linux: '/folder/path/keystore.p12'.

store_types.Name: RFDER
store_types.ClientMachineDescription: The Client Machine field for Certificate Stores of type 'RFDER' should be the DNS name or IP address of the remote orchestrated server. Example for Windows: 'https://myserver.mydomain.com:5986'.
store_types.StorePathDescription: The Store Path field for Certificate Stores of type 'RFDER' should include the full path and file name, along with the file extension if applicable. Example for Linux: '/folder/path/certificate.der'.

store_types.Name: RFKDB
store_types.ClientMachineDescription: The Client Machine field for Certificate Stores of type 'RFKDB' should be the DNS name or IP address of the remote orchestrated server. Example for Windows: 'https://myserver.mydomain.com:5986'.
store_types.StorePathDescription: The Store Path field for Certificate Stores of type 'RFKDB' should include the full path and file name, along with the file extension if applicable. Example for Linux: '/folder/path/keystore.kdb'.

store_types.Name: RFORA
store_types.ClientMachineDescription: The Client Machine field for Certificate Stores of type 'RFORA' should be the DNS name or IP address of the remote orchestrated server. Example for Windows: 'https://myserver.mydomain.com:5986'.
store_types.StorePathDescription: The Store Path field for Certificate Stores of type 'RFORA' should include the full path and file name, specifically including the 'eWallet.p12' file name by convention. Example for Linux: '/folder/path/eWallet.p12'.
